**Summary**
• Tesla’s board backs a $1 trillion pay package for Elon Musk.
• Musk must deliver on robots and robotaxis to get the full payout.
• This move signals Tesla’s massive bet on becoming a tech giant, not just a car company.
Impact — If Musk succeeds, Tesla could dominate both the EV and AI markets, changing the game forever.
